full_summary:
### **Office Seating Contract Notice**
#### Tender Details

| Field Name     | Field Value                                              |
| :------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Reference No.** | PW-22-01015121                                          |
| **Amendment No.** | 4                                                        |
| **Solicitation No.** | 20221313                                                |
| **Publication Date** | 2022-11-30                                               |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2022-12-16T14:00:00                                       |
| **Amendment Date** | 2022-12-14                                                |
| **Contract Start Date** | N/A (to be determined)                                   |
| **Contract End Date** | N/A (to be determined)                                   |
| **Procurement Status** | Expired                                                  |
| **Purchasing Category** | Goods (Office Furniture)                                  |
| **Trade Agreements** | Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)          |

#### Tender Description
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating at 255 Albert Street (Ottawa, ON) and 121 King Street (Toronto, ON). The RFP covers a set-aside requirement for Aboriginal-owned businesses and is available through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (buyandsell.gc.ca).

#### Eligibility Criteria
Only pre-qualified suppliers with an active Supply Arrangement (SA) can bid on this contract. Non-SA holders may submit a bid but must also submit a request for a SA. Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in RFSA E60PQ-120001/G.

#### Contact Information
To inquire about this RFP, please contact:
- Name: Alanna Duncan
- Email: [alanna.duncan@osfi-bsif.gc.ca](mailto:alanna.duncan@osfi-bsif.gc.ca)
- Phone: N/A
- Fax: N/A

#### Supporting Documents
Please refer to the following attachments for more information on this RFP:

- [rfp_20221313_chairs_e.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/30/b232bc74980bf53179a7caea7872dd84/rfp_20221313_chairs_e.pdf)
- [rfp_20221313_chairs_e_amd001.pdf](https
